select-NFTs.question: Which NFTs are you looking to trade
select-NFTs.add-instruction: Add them here by clicking below
select-NFTs.selected-nfts-description: These items will be included in the trade listing

trade-details.question: What are you looking for?
trade-details.instructions: Define if you'd like any specific items or if you are open to any offers
trade-details.instruction-2: Select the collections or coins you'd like to receive in an offer

choose-visibility.question: What's the listing's visibility?
choose-visibility.instruction: Define if you'd this to be available to the public or just for a specific user
choose-visibility.option-1-subtitle-mobile: All users will be able to view the listing
choose-visibility.option-2-subtitle-mobile: Share with a specific peer's wallet address
choose-visibility.public-message: Whoohoo! This listing will be available for everyone :)

confirm-listing.title-message: Let’s double check everything looks good
confirm-listing.instruction: Review the details below and make any adjustments
confirm-listing.congratulations-message: Your listing has been successfully created! Check the activity feed on "My Dashboard" for incoming offers
